{if $goods.goods_status eq BEHALF_GOODS_PREPARED }
    • {/if} {if $goods.goods_status eq BEHALF_GOODS_READY }
    • {/if} {if $goods.goods_status eq BEHALF_GOODS_TOMORROW }
    • {/if} {if $goods.goods_status eq BEHALF_GOODS_UNFORMED }
    • {/if} {if $goods.goods_status eq BEHALF_GOODS_UNSALE }
    • {/if} {if $goods.goods_status eq BEHALF_GOODS_SEND }
    • {/if} {if $goods.goods_status eq BEHALF_GOODS_REBACK }
    • {/if}
